sources.title: The Midnight Lady
sources.description: Title: The Midnight Lady Summary: (1932 Chesterfield) - John Darrow, Sarah Padden, Montagu Love, Claudia Dell. This is kind of a poverty row version of Madame X. Padden owns a notorious big-city speakeasy. When her long ... Directed by: Richard Thorpe Actors: Sarah Padden, John Darrow, Claudia Dell Production Company: Chesterfield Motion Pictures Corporation (I) Release Date: 15 May 1932 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 (1932 Chesterfield) - John Darrow, Sarah Padden, Montagu Love, Claudia Dell. This is kind of a poverty row version of Madame X. Padden owns a notorious big-city speakeasy. When her long lost daughter is accused of murder, she decides to take the rap for her. The daughter has no idea that her mother is even alive. A pretty good Chesterfield. 16mm.

sources.title: The Midnight Lady (1932) CLAUDIA DELL
sources.description:
Exclusive Movie Class Edition!
Stars: Sarah Padden, Claudia Dell, Theodore Van Eltz
Director: Richard Thorpe
A dazzling young blonde, raised to believe her mother had died, is now engaged to a respectable lawyer. SURPRISE! Mom is actually alive and thriving as the operator of a popular speakeasy, the very, very hot spot her naughty girl rendezvous with a notorious ladies man. When her daughter is accused of a deadly crime of passion, will she take the rap and reveal herself? If you prefer your Pre-Code PizzaFLIX with a hefty topping of Madame X, this slice is for you!
CHAPTERS
0:00 Movie Class Introduction
5:25 Feature Synopsis
6:22 The Midnight Lady

When her long lost daughter is accused of murder, she decides to take the rap for her. The daughter has no idea that her mother is even alive. A pretty good Chesterfield. 16mm.
